item.title: Making XP faster
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

find this in client.java

 case 0: // Attack levelup

change to this

       case 0: // Attack levelup
       refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(6247);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248);
	   sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) {
addItem(10706,1);
addItem(10705,1);
}
	   break;
	   case 1: // Strength
	   refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(6206);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207);
	   sendFrame126("Your strength level is now "+playerLevel[2]+" .", 6208);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[2] >= 99) {
addItem(10709,1);
addItem(10708,1);
}
	   break;
	   case 2: // Defence
	   refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(6253);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254);
	   sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[1] >= 99) {
addItem(10712,1);
addItem(10711,1);
}
	   break;
	   case 3: //Hitpoints
	   refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(6216);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level!", 6217);
	   sendFrame126("Your hitpoints level is now "+playerLevel[3]+" .", 6218);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[3] >= 99) {
addItem(10727,1);
addItem(10726,1);
}
	   break;
	   case 4: //Ranging
	   refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(4443);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a ranged level!", 4444);
	   sendFrame126("Your ranged level is now "+playerLevel[4]+" .", 4445);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a ranging level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[4] >= 99) {
addItem(10715,1);
addItem(10714,1);
}
	   break;
	   case 5: // Prayer
	   refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(6242);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a prayer level!", 6243);
	   sendFrame126("Your prayer level is now "+playerLevel[5]+" .", 6244);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a prayer level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[5] >= 99) {
addItem(10718,1);
addItem(10717,1);
}
	   break;
	   case 6: // Magic
	   refreshSkills();
	   sendFrame164(6211);
	   stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
	   sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a magic level!", 6212);
	   sendFrame126("Your magic level is now "+playerLevel[6]+" .", 6213);
	   sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a magic level.");
	   NpcDialogueSend = true;
	   if (playerLevel[6] >= 99) {
addItem(10721,1);
addItem(10720,1);
}

this is only the combat skills i trust you could do the rest

item.title: Making XP faster
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

well first off when you train it should give you a message search for that message in client.java you should find somthing similar

case 2514:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("You receive some range xp.");
setAnimation(426);
actionTimer = 15;
addSkillXP((50000*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((50000*playerLevel[4]), 4);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

edit the skill exp the 3 is for hp the 4 is for range exp

Read full topic

item.title: Making XP faster
item.dc:creator: @Java_Coffee Java_Coffee™
item.description:
@Java_Coffee wrote:

Check how many xp did you raise when u click once on training, then go to client.java, find that xp number, edit it, compile, run. Da-ta, you are done.

Read full topic
